Events from January 14, 2025 – February 27, 2025 – City of San Saba, Texas



[Skip to content](https://sansabatexas.com/events/list/#main)


City Alerts

**The City of San Saba is proud to announce that the Boil Water Notice posted on 1/26/26 has been rescinded.**

[Today](https://sansabatexas.com/events/list/)

* ### February 2026
* ![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/council-chambers-1-compressed.jpg "council-chambers-1-compressed")

  #### [City Council Meeting @Council Chambers](https://sansabatexas.com/event/city-council-meeting-council-chambers-11/ "City Council Meeting @Council Chambers")

  February 10 @ 6:00 pm
  -
  8:00 pm

  The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on Tuesday, January 13th, beginning at 6:00 p.m. in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.
* ### March 2026
* ![Night at the Museum Annual Fundraiser](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/city_slide_museum_fundraiser.jpg "city_slide_museum_fundraiser")

  March 7 @ 4:00 pm
  -
  7:00 pm

  The Night at The Museum is the museum's annual fundraiser and celebrates Texas Independence with live demonstrations, speakers, campfire cooking, and more. Join us on Saturday, Mary 7th, for a memorable evening.

Monday – Thursday: 7:30am – 5:30pm
